bump
====

Bumps package version numbers

Usage:
------

::

    $ bump setup.py
    1.0.2 => 1.0.3
    Is this ok? y/n y
    Updated setup.py

    $ bump setup.py -M
    1.0.2 => 2.0.0
    Is this ok? y/n y
    Updated setup.py

    $ bump setup.py -m
    2.0.0 => 2.1.0
    Is this ok? y/n y
    Updated setup.py
